Reviews.Title: Almost Turn Key system works.
Reviews.Author: J. Wallace
Reviews.Content: A couple of minor problems only.  CD with documentation and instructions is for an earlier version of software and load up must be done manually on Windows XP.This system requires a dedicated hard drive or a partitioned hard drive to properly work.While I doubt if the equipment was originally $1,000.  This is good equipment with clear cameras, working IR, and what must be advanced security software as it is quite flexible in processing surveillance footage.The seller is helpful.The only question in my mind is whether to buy a second set to expand.

ProductInfo.Features:
Easier to use Real time display with multi-screen views; 4 Weatherproof Outdoor Day Night Vision CCD 420TVL Security Cameras
30 fps recording and display. Simultaneously record and monitor 4 cameras
Advanced event search features: search recorded files by year, month, date, hour
Cards are stackable, expendable to 16 channel;Digital duplex operation, AVI file back up; free surveillance DeCal included
